title: [Valley of Gold, Bazaar]
description: Flowering brush and shrubbery mark the path that leads throughout the bazaar.  Sunlight trickles down from above, filtering through thick treetops above.  Alabaster and sapphire blue ribbons are draped over the foliage decorating the clearing with their shimmering colors.

Flowering brush and shrubbery mark the path that leads throughout the bazaar.  Pale moonlight trickles down from above, filtering through thick treetops above.  Alabaster and sapphire blue ribbons are draped over the foliage decorating the clearing with their shimmering colors.
location: between Wehnimer's Landing and Zul Logoth
